input.sentences: i stopped by a small town on my road trip .
there were a lot of unique items available .
i bought some souvenirs while i was there .
i stopped to watch the trains go by before heading on my way .
output.sentences: We stopped at an old town store.
It was full of unique items and sports equipment.
Even the souvenirs had a touch of old times.
So much old wood in the place we could have bought so much of it.
And then outside of it we could watch the train roll in and stop at the location.
